name: Talk To Me (Omnidimensional)
description:
This is a very short, simple text based game, where you can talk to a simple AI (maybe pretending they're a friend, family member, or someone else), and maybe it could make you feel just a little better on a bad day. That's the whole intention of this little project, after all. It could also just be used to gush about what a good day you had to, though. 
It should be playable on anything, as its an .html game, but i haven't tested it.
